com.linkedin.parseq.promise
Interface PromiseListener<P>

All Known Implementing Classes:
CountDownPromiseListener
public interface PromiseListener<P>

A listener can be registered with a promise. When that promise is resolved (either it has a value or an error) the onResolved(Promise) method will be invoked.

Author:
Chris Pettitt (cpettitt@linkedin.com), Chi Chan (ckchan@linkedin.com)
See Also:
Promise.addListener(PromiseListener)

Method Summary
 void onResolved(Promise<P> promise)
          A callback method that is invoked when the promise completes.
 

Method Detail

onResolved

void onResolved(Promise<P> promise)
A callback method that is invoked when the promise completes. The code in this method should not block.

Parameters:
promise - the promise that was completed
